title: The Last Letter from the Manoir de la Lune
tagline: A dying philosopher summons her estranged lover to a windswept Breton cliff to settle the final argument of their lives.

story: Write a letter from Éloïse to Julien from five years after their split, one she never sent.
Describe a day in the life of the housekeeper at the Manoir de la Lune, observing the two philosophers.
Write the 'final piece of business' Éloïse wants to complete, from her perspective.
Create a new chapter where Julien discovers a hidden cache of Éloïse's letters to other thinkers.
technical: Build an interactive map of the Manoir de la Lune and its cliffside setting.
Create a web app that presents the novel as a series of exchanged letters and diary entries, revealing content based on reader choices.

cover_prompt: A solitary woman stands on a windswept cliff edge, her back to the viewer, clutching a single, weathered letter as her dark dress whips violently in the gale, facing the immense, storm-tossed sea below a manor's silhouette, [Detailed Scene & Context: the scene is charged with emotional and intellectual tension, the crashing waves mirroring the turmoil of a final confrontation, with the stark, Gothic architecture of the Manoir de la Lune perched precariously on the cliff behind her, its windows glowing faintly like distant, watchful eyes], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric and emotionally resonant style of a Caspar David Friedrich painting, combined with the delicate, melancholic realism of Vilhelm Hammershøi, rendered in textured oil on canvas], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and dramatic low-angle composition that emphasizes the vast, oppressive sky and the figure's small, defiant stance against the elements, creating a sense of sublime isolation], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a single, cold source breaking through storm clouds, casting long, deep shadows, using a restrained palette of slate grey, charcoal, muted sea foam green, and the faintest wash of pale, lunar gold on the horizon], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
